ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Spare_Vehicle_Delivery_Time__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( Spare_Vehicle_Returning_Time__c )), Spare_Vehicle_Delivery_Time__c <> Spare_Vehicle_Returning_Time__c, Spare_Vehicle_Returning_Time__c <= Spare_Vehicle_Delivery_Time__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Spare Vehicle Returning Time should not be earlier than the Spare Vehicle Delivery Time
